{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Queen Onekaza II |image = Portrait Queen Onezaka II Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Queen Onekaza II.png |caption = |race = Aumaua |subrace = Island |gender = Female |culture = [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/) |background = |faction = [Huana](/huana/) |deity = |personality = |class = Cipher |level = 16 |MIG = 17 |CON = 10 |DEX = 12 |PER = 14 |INT = 13 |RES = 14 |health = 158 |damage = 28-48 {{pierce}}{{slash}} |accuracy = 89 |penetration = 10 |deflection = 69 |fortitude = 84 |reflex = 77 |will = 94 |dr = 3 |ability = [Among the Waves](/amongTheWaves/), [Soul Whip](/soulWhipDeadfire/), [Mind Wave](/mindWaveDeadfire/), [Soul Shock](/soulShockDeadfire/), [Phantom Foes](/phantomFoesDeadfire/), [Psychovampiric Shield](/psychovampiricShieldDeadfire/), [Ectopsychic Echo](/ectopsychicEchoDeadfire/), [Psychic Backlash](/psychicBacklashDeadfire/), [Pain Block](/painBlockDeadfire/), [Borrowed Instinct](/borrowedInstinctDeadfire/), [Echoing Shield](/echoingShield/), [Tactical Meld](/tacticalMeldDeadfire/), [Disintegration](/disintegrationDeadfire/), [The Empty Soul](/theEmptySoul/), [Ancestor's Memory](/ancestorsMemory/), [Echoing Horror](/echoingHorror/), [The Complete Self](/theCompleteSelf/), [A Soul's Echo](/aSoulsEcho/) |location = [Kahanga Palace - Rooftop](/kahangaPalaceRooftop/) |quests = [Taking Out the Traders](/takingOutTheTraders/)

[He Waits in Fire](/heWaitsInFire/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = Equipped gear |head = Serpent Crown |body = Royal Huana Clothing |ring1 = Ring of Minor Protection |waist = Trollhide Belt (Deadfire){{!}}Trollhide Belt |weapon1 = Legendary Hunting Bow (Deadfire){{!}}Legendary Hunting Bow |weapon2 = Superb Spear (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Spear |weapon2_offhand = Superb Small Shield (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Small Shield |internalname = NPC_PD_Queen_Onezaka_II |guid = e1db072c-d573-4cc9-8fb3-23e11e83bb85 }} '''Queen Onekaza II''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Queen Onekaza II is the head of the Kahanga tribe of the [Huana](/huana/) and queen regnant of much of the Deadfire. She is a shrewd diplomat, strategist, and a talented cipher who favors soft words and decisive action: A velvet glove hiding an iron fist, but preferring to outmaneuver and outwit enemies, rather than confront them head on - an essential element of her strategy that enabled the [Huana](/huana/) to withstand the expansion of [Rauatai](/rauatai/) and the [Vailian Republics](/vailianRepublics/) into the Archipelago. The Queen receives many gifts and boons from her subjects and other tribes. The most notable are a pair of white tigers from the Wapua tribe, named Kohopa and Tangaloa by the Queen, much to the chagrin of traditionalist priests. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [The Veins of Eora](/theVeinsOfEora/) * [The Shadow Under Neketaka](/theShadowUnderNeketaka/) * [Fruitful Alliance](/fruitfulAlliance/) * [Taking Out the Traders](/takingOutTheTraders/) * [The Final Maneuver](/theFinalManeuver/) * [He Waits in Fire](/heWaitsInFire/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [The Veins of Eora](/theVeinsOfEora/): The Queen dispatches you to Hasongo to investigate. * [From the Wreckage](/fromTheWreckage/): Report back to the Queen to summarize your findings at [Hasongo](/hasongo/). * [The Shadow Under Neketaka](/theShadowUnderNeketaka/): She wants you to look into recent troubles at the [Watershapers Guild](/watershapersGuild/). * [Fruitful Alliance](/fruitfulAlliance/): Onekaza wants you to recruit the reclusive [Wahaki](/wahaki/) tribe to support the Huana. * [Taking Out the Traders](/takingOutTheTraders/): The [Royal Deadfire Company](/royalDeadfireCompany/) and the [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/) must be eliminated in the interests of the Huana. * [The Final Maneuver](/theFinalManeuver/): The Queen is the target of the Royal Deadfire Company's final push for power. [Category:Serpent's Crown characters](/categorySerpentsCrownCharacters/) [Category:Kahanga Palace characters](/categoryKahangaPalaceCharacters/)

[[He Waits in Fire]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = Equipped gear |head = Serpent Crown |body = Royal Huana Clothing |ring1 = Ring of Minor Protection |waist = Trollhide Belt (Deadfire){{!}}Trollhide Belt |weapon1 = Legendary Hunting Bow (Deadfire){{!}}Legendary Hunting Bow |weapon2 = Superb Spear (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Spear |weapon2_offhand = Superb Small Shield (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Small Shield |internalname = NPC_PD_Queen_Onezaka_II |guid = e1db072c-d573-4cc9-8fb3-23e11e83bb85 }} '''Queen Onekaza II''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== Queen Onekaza II is the head of the Kahanga tribe of the [[Huana]] and queen regnant of much of the Deadfire. She is a shrewd diplomat, strategist, and a talented cipher who favors soft words and decisive action: A velvet glove hiding an iron fist, but preferring to outmaneuver and outwit enemies, rather than confront them head on - an essential element of her strategy that enabled the [[Huana]] to withstand the expansion of [[Rauatai]] and the [[Vailian Republics]] into the Archipelago. The Queen receives many gifts and boons from her subjects and other tribes. The most notable are a pair of white tigers from the Wapua tribe, named Kohopa and Tangaloa by the Queen, much to the chagrin of traditionalist priests. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = * [[The Veins of Eora]] * [[The Shadow Under Neketaka]] * [[Fruitful Alliance]] * [[Taking Out the Traders]] * [[The Final Maneuver]] * [[He Waits in Fire]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[The Veins of Eora]]: The Queen dispatches you to Hasongo to investigate. * [[From the Wreckage]]: Report back to the Queen to summarize your findings at [[Hasongo]]. * [[The Shadow Under Neketaka]]: She wants you to look into recent troubles at the [[Watershapers Guild]]. * [[Fruitful Alliance]]: Onekaza wants you to recruit the reclusive [[Wahaki]] tribe to support the Huana. * [[Taking Out the Traders]]: The [[Royal Deadfire Company]] and the [[Vailian Trading Company]] must be eliminated in the interests of the Huana. * [[The Final Maneuver]]: The Queen is the target of the Royal Deadfire Company's final push for power. [[Category:Serpent's Crown characters]] [[Category:Kahanga Palace characters]]
title: Queen Onekaza II
